column5: Sorry guys .. just practicing ...but seriously .. when are we gonna do our team picks for 2008 ?  I am fully expecting to post my biggest 2008 NGL Trout for my team next weekend ... and would HATE to see it not count  ... I'm taking pictures with the logo ... but what date do I need to put on it ????   Just kidding .. besides ... now I am pretty much destined to do a peppy-la-pew  Oh .. btw ... in case I am not here ... I ONLY register fish for team 7 .. so its better that I get put on that team
Hey.... has there been any word on the formation of teams yet>?
Well I released the winner last week Jon ! Since a tourney hasn't been started yet... I guess I'll have to pass now. Will never get another monster like that...
True enough Irishfield..  That may have been a once in a lifetime fish through the ice  Cheers  Craig
